posts.post_content:
Bat off
Bat on
Red
Green

I'd like to find an example of either. This will be something a bit different and I'm in no real rush. I'd just like to see who has what. And I generally will be looking in the PSA1-2 range. 

Red would be the preferable card but if something has good eye appeal then I'm def. open to it. 

Let me know what you guys have.
